alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:46AM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Paso County through 1245 AM MDT... At 1144 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Indian Cliffs Ranch, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Horizon City, Fabens, Indian Cliffs Ranch, Lake Way Estates, Agua Dulce, Dairyland and Colonia del Paso. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 45 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties
